title: Memorial Hall Renovation Open House Thank You (Greenville City School District)
text: ( Source : Greenville City School District ) On behalf of Greenville City Schools Board of Education , administration, staff and student body we would like to thank and express our appreciation to Senator Keith Faber , Senator Bill Beagle ,
